formalpara.title: Movie 1. Time-lapse DIC microscopy of one-cell stage embryo from the onset of polarity establishment until the early two-cell stage.
formalpara.para: In this and the other movies, embryos are approximately 50 μm long and oriented with anterior to the left. Time is indicated in minutes and seconds from the beginning of the recording. Courtesy of Zoltán Spiró (Gönczy laboratory).
